verses.verse: Contend, <S%H7378><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> with those who contend <S%H7378><s%> with me. <S%H3898><s%> Fight against those who fight against me. <S%H3898><s%>
Take hold <S%H2388><s%> of shield <S%H4043><s%> and buckler, <S%H6793><s%> and stand up <S%H6965><s%> for my help. <S%H5833><s%>
Brandish <S%H7324><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> and block <S%H5462><s%> those <S%H7125><s%> who pursue <S%H7291><s%> me. <S%H559><s%> Tell my soul, <S%H5315><s%> "I am your salvation. <S%H3444><s%>"

Let those who seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%> be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and brought to dishonor. <S%H3637><s%> Let those who plot <S%H2803><s%> my ruin <S%H7451><s%> be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> and confounded. <S%H2659><s%>
Let them be as chaff <S%H4671><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s angel <S%H4397><s%> driving them on. <S%H1760><s%>
Let their way <S%H1870><s%> be dark <S%H2822><s%> and slippery, <S%H2519><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s angel <S%H4397><s%> pursuing them. <S%H7291><s%>

For without cause <S%H2600><s%> they have hidden <S%H2934><s%> their net <S%H7568><s%> in a pit <S%H7845><s%> for me. <S%H2600><s%> Without cause they have dug <S%H2658><s%> a pit for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Let destruction <S%H7722><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on him unawares. <S%H3045><s%> Let his net <S%H7568><s%> that he has hidden <S%H2934><s%> catch <S%H3920><s%> himself. <S%H5307><s%> Let him fall into that destruction. <S%H7722><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be joyful <S%H1523><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> It shall rejoice <S%H7797><s%> in his salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

All my bones <S%H6106><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who is like you, <S%H5337><s%> who delivers the poor <S%H6041><s%> from him who is too strong <S%H2389><s%> for him; <S%H6041><s%> yes, the poor and the needy <S%H6041><s%> from him who robs him? <S%H1497><s%>"
Unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> rise up. <S%H6965><s%> They ask me about things <S%H7592><s%> that I don't <S%H3045><s%> know about.
They reward <S%H7999><s%> me evil <S%H7451><s%> for good, <S%H2896><s%> to the bereaving <S%H7908><s%> of my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

But as for me, <S%H2470><s%> when they were sick, my clothing <S%H3830><s%> was sackcloth. <S%H8242><s%> I afflicted <S%H6031><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> with fasting. <S%H6685><s%> My prayer <S%H8605><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> into my own bosom. <S%H2436><s%>

I behaved <S%H1980><s%> myself as though it had been my friend <S%H7453><s%> or my brother. <S%H251><s%> I bowed down <S%H7817><s%> mourning, <S%H6937><s%> as one who mourns <S%H57><s%> his mother. <S%H517><s%>

But in my adversity, <S%H6761><s%> they rejoiced, <S%H8055><s%> and gathered themselves together. <S%H622><s%> The attackers <S%H5222><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%> against me, <S%H3045><s%> and I didn't know it. <S%H7167><s%> They tore at me, <S%H1826><s%> and didn't cease.
Like the profane <S%H2611><s%> mockers <S%H3934><s%> in feasts, <S%H4580><s%> they gnashed <S%H2786><s%> their teeth at me. <S%H8127><s%>

Lord, <S%H136><s%> how long will you look on? <S%H7200><s%> Rescue <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from their destruction, <S%H7722><s%> my precious <S%H3173><s%> life from the lions. <S%H3715><s%>
I will give you thanks <S%H3034><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly. <S%H6951><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> you among many <S%H6099><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

Don't <S%H341><s%> let those who are my enemies wrongfully <S%H8267><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me; <S%H8130><s%> neither let those who hate me without a cause <S%H2600><s%> wink <S%H7169><s%> their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
For they don't <S%H1696><s%> speak peace, <S%H7965><s%> but they devise <S%H2803><s%> deceitful <S%H4820><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> against those who are quiet <S%H7282><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
Yes, <S%H6310><s%> they opened their mouth wide <S%H7337><s%> against me. <S%H559><s%> They said, "Aha! <S%H1889><s%> Aha! <S%H1889><s%> Our eye <S%H5869><s%> has seen it! <S%H7200><s%>"
You have seen <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. Don't <S%H2790><s%> keep silent. Lord, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H7368><s%> be far from me.
Wake <S%H6974><s%> up! <S%H5782><s%> Rise up to defend <S%H4941><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> my God! My Lord, <S%H136><s%> contend for me! <S%H7379><s%>
Vindicate <S%H8199><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh my God, <S%H430><s%> according to your righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Don't <S%H8055><s%> let them gloat over me.
Don't <S%H559><s%> let them say in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> "Aha! <S%H1889><s%> That <S%H5315><s%>'s the way we want it!" Don't <S%H559><s%> let them say, "We have swallowed him up! <S%H1104><s%>"

Let them be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H954><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> who rejoice <S%H8056><s%> at my calamity. <S%H7451><s%> Let them be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with shame <S%H1322><s%> and dishonor <S%H1322><s%> who magnify themselves against me. <S%H1431><s%>

Let them shout for joy <S%H7442><s%> and be glad, <S%H8055><s%> who favor <S%H2655><s%> my righteous cause. <S%H6664><s%> Yes, <S%H559><s%> let them say continually, <S%H8548><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> be magnified, <S%H1431><s%> who has pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> of his servant! <S%H5650><s%>"
My tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall talk <S%H1897><s%> about your righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and about your praise <S%H8416><s%> all day long. <S%H3117><s%>
